DOC.brief_summary: A combined molecular breast image / ultrasound system enable coregistration functional abnormality see Molecular Breast Imaging ( MBI ) correspond anatomical abnormality see ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study : Combined Molecular Breast Imaging/Ultrasound System Diagnostic Evaluation MBI-detected Lesions
DOC.criteria: The pilot study comprise 12 woman age 40 old least one follow inclusion criterion : 1 . Have find mass lesion mammography breast MRI ( BIRADS 0 , 4 5 ) > 0.5 cm < 2 cm size additional workup focus ultrasound . 2 . Have find mass lesion ultrasound ( BIRADS 0 , 4 5 ) > 0.5 cm < 2 cm size . 3 . Have positive finding MBI < 2 cm size require additional diagnostic workup focus ultrasound . 1 . Are unable understand sign consent form 2 . Are pregnant lactate 3 . Are physically unable sit upright still 40 minute 4 . Have undergone bilateral mastectomy 5 . Are scheduled undergo conventional ultrasound
